meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Brian M. Satagaj, Halff Associates, Inc.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the June 17, 2024 Special Called City Plan Commission ForwardDallas Meeting, July 25, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, and the September 19, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Minor Amendments
agenda_items.description: An application for a minor amendment to an existing site/landscape plan for Specific Use Permit No. 1310 for a private school on property zoned an R-5(A) Single Family District.

agenda_items.title: Development Plans
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan and landscape plan on property zoned Planned Development Subdistrict No. 83 within Planned Development District No.193.
agenda_items.presenter: Brian M. Satagaj, Halff Associates, Inc.

agenda_items.title: 2025 City Plan Commission Calendar
agenda_items.description: Consideration of Appointments to CPC Committees.
